title: League Community: A league of Toddlers.
body:
Yeah, this community IS a bunch of toddlers, And I have yet to see an exception. 
I am sick of the egotistical, self-centered, entitled attitudes of the spoiled toddlers that make up the league community

The toddlers act like they are superior to the other 4 players on thier team. The whole game revolves around them. 
If they die ONCE, the game is over. If thier team dies for ANY REASON, it is automatically "report for intentional feed" (despite just watching 3 enemy players ambush the player) 
This community will not hesitate to tilt thier team to achieve thier own desired "perfect game". 
Teammates will sit and let thier team die just to preserve thier own KDA (Teamfight breaks out: "I cant help you, I might die")
People are so hungry for thier "S" that they dont even want to play the game anymore. I think thats why people are so quick to call GG after ONE death. They wont get thier precious "S" grade so there is no reason to play the actual match. 

This toddler community is so hung up on THIER OWN EGO. The "Solo carry" mentality that they are happy to tilt and sabotage thier own team because THEY THEMSELVES arent the center of attention. This community has NO interest in helping new players, just tellng them how complete garbage they are and how they need to go die because they arent playing at a CHALLENGER level from GAME 1. 
I have on many occations said OUTright that "I am new with this character, any build reccomendations?" or "whats the best way to use this champ?" and what I get back is either silence, or "Stfu noob" and then later on the player will turn on me and remind me just how garbage I am every 5 seconds. After I told them I was NEW with a particular champ....they try and "/all "report X for feeding" 
why? because I wasnt instantly challenger with them so I ruined thier chance of getting an S and therefore removed ANY incentive for them to play the game. 

This community has become so hung up on thier own superiority, the disgusting sense of smugness, that if the game doesnt go exactly how they want, or presents ANY sort of challenge, these toddlers completely break down and go afk in spawn. they pull an "Im done" and will sit in spawn commenting on how trash the rest of the team is, who now has to work HARDER because the player throws a tantrum and treats thier BRUISED EGO like a SEVERED LIMB. These people dont CARE about working with thier team, they dont CARE about objectives. They dont CARE about Wins. 
What they DO CARE ABOUT is:
- Having the most kills
-Bragging to their teammates about how "op" they are
- talking down to and demanding everyone else play how THEY want. 
- Taking ALL the kills and calling "ks" on anyone else besides them who gets a kill
- reminding the rest of thier team (And the other team through all chat) just how "trash garbage" they are, how much they "suk" at the game. 

I am growing less and less interested in playing how or what they want me to play. Not because I am trying to break the meta or create some new "flavor of the month" meta. But because I really dont see any point in communicating with a bunch of spoiled, egotistical toddlers who Dont care that there are 2 other lanes on the map (Talking about the "ivory tower" top laners who never leave top even at the cost of thier base) and there are 4 OTHER players on the team (Talking to players who only care about "All about me") 

So yeah, Riot it is really time to retire the summoners code. No one uses it, those who try to use it are laughed right off the game. It is treated like a joke (a bad one). I would probably have more fun babysitting a preschool of ACTUAL toddlers, rather than dealing with the crying screaming little ego toddlers I get when I que up for a ranked match that requires teamwork and strategy. Instead I get a bunch of kids who treat the game like a call of duty free for all where the ONLY thing that matters to them is "I got more kills than u". And even if the match ends in a loss, they will still brag about how "look at my kills, ur trash, u just suk at the game". 

RiP: Summoners code - 2017

replies.body: So where are you in this? Vastly superior to the incredibly exaggerated state you describe?

Nah, I am in no way perfect, I know I screw up (and I am perfectly fine admitting when I "dun goofed"). But I dont sit there for 20+ Minutes, beating a player over the head with a mistake they made at  the 5 min mark and carrying on reminding them just how Garbage they are every 10 seconds. I learn best through trial and error, I am in no way perfect, I only do the best I CAN do. I have no delusions that I am some "gods gift to league" player. I do my best, but the game requires ALL players to work together. Not One player sit back and throw the rest of thier team at the enemy so they can jump in and clean up kills, Then tell thier teammates how garbage they are at the game for dying to the enemy team. 

I have flaws, I screw up. But at least I am willing to admit them, and not throw a temper tantrum after going 0/1 because I wont get an "S".

Really sucks that you have a high percentage of toxic people in your games, but it isn't fair to the decent people in the community to lump them together with the toxic people by calling the community as composed of nothing but toddlers.
This is why i play ARAM almost exclusively, since season 6. Ranked is clown fiesta, even riot admits it.

"I am sick of the egotistical, self-centered, entitled attitudes of the spoiled toddlers that make up the league community"
So let me post how my opinion is more valid than anothers....

"All about me"
heres my opinion, you will accept it only, because I am right about the world.

"This community has become so hung up on thier own superiority"
I think I am above everyone else's opinion therefore I am right about everything.....


Just saying you're argument is a very self centered argument. Not trying to say what you say is wrong, more just put in such a way that only invokes a response that doesn't aid to your cause

Those are only My opinions. My observations. 
Not ONCE did I say My opinion is more valid than the others.
Not ONCE did I say everyone has to accept it. 
Not ONCE did I say "I am right about the world"
Not ONCE did I say I think I am above everyone elses opinion. 

sorry, if this was a test of trying to read my mind, or read my intentions, you failed. 
I have been on here sinse season 3. and if anything, I am very observant. These are the observations I have made. and I am sure others have thier own horror stories. 
There will always be people who think what they want, they are entitled to thier opinions. 
but if someone were to ask me? based on what I have seen in the many seasons. I have seen absolutely NOTHING but spoiled entitled children who think they are "too pro" to actualy work with thier team. 
Even in my last game, had a twitch who spent the whole game bragging about himself (though he went 14/12 and went afk at start) and spent the game talking about how I got my "Mastery 7 Velkoz" by "u were carried"
Sorry, you dont get mastery tokens by being carried. 

but he expected the entire team to fawn over him, to further inflate his ego. 
This is a team game, for 98% of the community, thats a foreign concept (I seriously get so sick of the constant  "1v1 me bruh" and "Dude u suk, cant 1v1 me?")

You have an opinion you wished voice
"Yeah, this community IS a bunch of toddlers, And I have yet to see an exception.
I am sick of the egotistical, self-centered, entitled attitudes of the spoiled toddlers that make up the league community"
But by voicing such a strong opinion you yourself are becoming entitled to what you believe it means. You want people to accept your opinion as a fact of the matter, and you believe you are right in this matter. I can't say otherwise as I don't have your experience, I enjoy league. I rarely see any of what you describe. As such we're both entitled to our fact of the matter opinions
Here's an exception: TyrekGoldenspear. He's nice, and isn't obsessed with himself. I'd list others, but they're not boards-users so I'm not gonna draw unwanted attention to them.

If they do exist they are too and far between. This game glorifies ONLY the people with "most kills" so in order to get that, people are happy to stab thier team in the back for thier own personal greed/self-interest. People will sit and wait just outside of battle for thier team to die, then wait till Long after thier team is dead to jump in and go clean up on the kills, when they could have probably helped save some of thier teammates, but no...its all about thier kills.
People will flame and degrade the support (why do you think no one wants to play support. Its not the items, its the attitude). 
I am a support main, But if my adc gets a swelled head and tells me how "useless/trash" I am, how they dont "need a support", I am happy to walk and let them PROVE IT. 
And I instantly watch the toddlers die to a 2v1, then call to report me for "Abandoning my role" (I am not abandoning my role, I am abandoning an egotistical blowhard with an overinfated ego who thinks they can 1v5 the enemy team, then throw a temper tantrum when reality proves to them otherwise.)
